args.name: envFile
args.description: path to a Mux access token .env file

sign.description: Creates a new signed URL token for a playback ID

expiresIn.name: expiresIn
expiresIn.description: How long the signature is valid for. If no unit is specified, milliseconds is assumed.

type.name: type
type.description: What type of token this signature is for.

args.name: playback-id
args.description: Playback ID to create a signed URL token for.

assets:create.description: Create a new asset in Mux using a file that's already available online

private.name: private
private.description: add a private playback policy to the created asset

args.name: input
args.description: input URL for the file you'd like to create this asset from

assets:upload.description: Create a new asset in Mux via a local file

private.name: private
private.description: add a private playback policy to the created asset

filter.name: filter
filter.description: regex that filters the selected destination if the provided path is a folder

concurrent.name: concurrent
concurrent.description: max number of files to upload at once

args.name: path
args.description: local path for the file (or folder) you'd like to upload
